info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 9:01PM MDT until April 22 at 9:45PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Hand County in central South Dakota... Eastern Faulk County in north central South Dakota... Northwestern Spink County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 1001 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Polo, or 17 miles southeast of Faulkton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Miranda around 1010 PM CDT. Zell and Rockham around 1015 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Athol, Chelsea, Mellette and Northville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
